An update from the Forums Council for March of 2012

1. Working on an LP "patch" to update Ubiquity and Firefox bookmarks.

1. FC continues to cross-train its members so we all can "share the load".

1. The forum staff will continue to encourage Ubuntu membership by extending personal invitations.

1. We approved six Ubuntu Membership Applications - congratulations to all.

1. New Tips & Tutorials should be added to the Wiki. The Tips and Tutorials forum will become support/discussion for Wiki articles.
